body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Publications            Publications       The Official Map and Guide for El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail is available to download and print. Please give these documents some time to download. To receive a printed copy e-mail us. Enjoy learning more about this national historic trail! Front side (timeline) 5.76 MB pdf Spanish translation: El Camino Real Mapa y Guía Oficial, El Sendero Histórico Nacional El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro, Nuevo México, Texas. Word 21 KB PDF 185 KB              Partial timeline from Official Map and Guide           Download El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro's rack card (750KB, PDF) for an overview of resources to explore the trail.
title: El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail: Publications
